markdownRemark.html:
This post is part of an ongoing series in which I document my journey through the COVID-19 quarantine. See Day 1 for full context.

Quick update

Finished reading a new book. Published a blog post in dev.to and a technical one in here. Also made a lot of progress on my node-reminders open source project which I will release soon. Worked some hours for contract work and helped wife with her upcoming business, looking good!

On top of that, I got to meditate and handwrite some pages on life, pure brain vomit. I was already doing it but now I’m following this specific advice which resounded pretty well with me.

Oh, and I finally switched to zsh.

Feeling super productive and enjoying life.

Data Report

  • Avoid news: No
  • Write blog: Yes
  • Personal growth: Yes
  • Wake up 5:00 am: Yes
  • Workout: No
  • Help someone: Yes
  • Time wasted < 90 mins: Yes

Finances

  • Stocks Portfolio (24h): +2.10%
  • Stocks Portfolio (All time): +11.59%
  • Cryptofolio (24h): +13.95%
  • Cryptofolio (All time): +62.86%

Stay tuned.
